pages.text: $(o)I've collected some notes from the old man's study about different sources of Power. Use these if you want some pointers to help you progress.

$(item)Ender Pearls$(0) seem a perfect source of the Warp Power, but given their unstable nature, I have calculated that the process will likely have some $(4)unintended side-effects$(0). Hm... well, only one way to find out, I suppose!

$(item)Gunpowder$(0) is Acidic, but something tells me that using an Ingredient so obviously Volatile may be Dangerous under the right conditions. For a safe alternative, use $(item)Nether Wart$(0) or some $(item)Crimson Flora$(0) from the Netherworld.

$(item)Soul Sand$(0) should be a perfect source of Soul power -- it's right in the Name, after all! But, something seems... $(l:intro/curse)off$(/l) about the resulting substance. I would like to recommend that Soul Sand is not used in any further Alchemical Experimentation.

The ingredients for Vital Power are quite rare, but just yesterday, I discovered that some had entered my Crucible out of nowhere! I checked my supplies, but nothing was missing, so the $(thing)Exterminator$(0) who came through last night is unlikely the cause. How could the power of Life Itself have appeared $(4)without using items at all?$(0)
